caption: Located inside Pioneer Plaza, directly across the street from Walmart.  Breakfast platters from $3 and up, made to order.. The also have breakfast bentos for those of you in a hurry..  Not sure of their hours.. but definitely opened Monday through Friday during breakfast and lunch.  They also have island style plate lunches, burgers and salads. Beverages, bottled, canned and fountain..fresh hot coffee too..  Highly recommend..  Update... no longer work in the area, but I was craving their 🍳 breakfast... I got there at just after 6am... and she had dozens of breakfast bentos she had just finished making and I ordered Breakfast A for $3 (one egg cooked to order, 2 beanie weanies, 2 portuguese sausage, one spam and 2 scoop rice) everything hot and fresh in about 2 minutes....  if you haven’t tried it.. I highly recommend...
